text: The Soubrette and the Simp is a 1914 American silent comedy film featuring Mabel Paige and Oliver Hardy. ==Cast== * Oliver Hardy as Fred, the Simp (as Babe Hardy) * Mabel Paige as The Soubrette * Don Ferrando as Owner of the show ==See also== * Oliver Hardy filmography ==External links== * Category:1914 films Category:American silent short films Category:1914 short films Category:American films Category:American black-and-white films Category:1914 comedy films Category:Films directed by Jerold T. Hevener Category:American comedy films Category:Comedy short films
title: The Soubrette and the Simp
